title: Delve Withrington
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20130918164746/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20130918164746/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Delve Withrington**

Currently an independent type designer in [Alameda](http://web.archive.org/web/20130918164746/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Alameda), CA publishing type designs through his foundry [Delve Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20130918164746/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Delve%20Fonts). Previously a type designer for [Monotype Imaging Inc.](http://web.archive.org/web/20130918164746/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Monotype%20Imaging%20Inc.) in [Redwood City](http://web.archive.org/web/20130918164746/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Redwood%20City), CA and [FontShop](http://web.archive.org/web/20130918164746/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FontShop) in [San Francisco](http://web.archive.org/web/20130918164746/http:/typophile.com/wiki/San%20Francisco), CA.

[Typophile User Profile: delve](http://web.archive.org/web/20130918164746/http:/typophile.com/user/910)
author: delve
